news.title: Rate-limiting update #1
news.content: Following yesterday's update, things have started to calm down a bit and the API seems to be returning slightly more consistent results. Adding characters should be a smoother experience now. That said, the API is still not 100% consistent and I am still working on stabilization before I move on to new features. Feel free to keep making full use of the Checklist page in the meantime, since that feature doesn't rely on Lodestone. Again, thank you for your patience!

news.title: Lodestone rate-limiting
news.content: Firstly, thank you all for your support and interest! After the traction this site has gotten from a Reddit thread, the API I use to get information from Lodestone (XIVAPI) is getting rate-limited by the sheer amount of people trying out XIV ToDo at the same time. Unfortunately, this means that the Lodestone is returning errors and incomplete data-sets. As such, you may be unable to add a character or get a complete and accurate view of your progression until the load stabilizes. I am looking into mitigating this issue in the future, but in the meantime please try refreshing your characters again later. Thank you!
